pullRequest.title: Implement standard subscribe to beacon committee subnet API
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Implements the standard subscribe to beacon committee subnet API.  Currently it subscribes if the request is for an aggregator as required, but does not use these requests to determine how many persistent subnet connections are required.
Fixed Issue(s)
#2756
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

commit.message: Implement standard subscribe to beacon committee subnet API.
